description: Main frontend React component for a knowledge base assistant application. Handles theme switching, file upload via drag-and-drop or file picker, and a question-answer search interface that interacts with backend APIs.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles between light and dark themes by updating the theme state.

methods.name: handleFileSelected
methods.description: Handles file selection, triggers file upload, manages progress and error states.

methods.name: onFileChange
methods.description: Handler for file input change event; initiates file upload.

methods.name: onDragOver
methods.description: Handles drag-over event to update UI state for drag-and-drop.

methods.name: onDragLeave
methods.description: Handles drag leave event to reset drag state.

methods.name: onDrop
methods.description: Handles file drop event to trigger file upload.

methods.name: handleQuerySubmit
methods.description: Submits user question to backend API and manages loading/error states.
